mean_cn: n. 左轮手枪，旋转式装置
mean_en: a small gun with a container for bullets that turns after the gun is fired and puts another bullet into position to be fired next
word_etyma: re再+volv旋转，卷+er表名词→子弹旋转打出 →连发左轮手枪，旋转式装置
sentence: The cowboy is holding two revolvers in his hands; you better stay clear!
sentence_trans: 这个牛仔手中拿着两把左轮手枪，你最好离他远点！
